stack.description:
This stack contains an implementation of algorithms in "Cooperative Multi-Robot Estimation and Control for Radio Source Localization" by Ben Charrow, Nathan Michael and Vijay Kumar. Specifically, it has code for a particle filter, LOS/NLOS classification of range measurements, and a mutual information planner.
To actually move the robots, the code uses a ROS wrapper of the RVO library which is available at https://github.com/bcharrow/rvo
stack.author: Maintained by Ben Charrow
